title: Myths & Facts About Covid-19 Vaccines
content:
Pfizer BioNtec
Moderna
Novavax
COVID-19 vaccines will not affect fertility.
FACT
Currently no evidence shows that any vaccines, including COVID-19 vaccines, cause fertility problems (problems trying to get pregnant) in women or men.
COVID-19 vaccination is recommended if you are pregnant, trying to get pregnant now, or might become pregnant in the future, as well as their partners.
Learn more about
COVID-19 vaccines and people who would like to have a baby
.
COVID-19 vaccines do not alter DNA.
